# PageColumn

<p class="description">API docs for the Toolpad Studio PageColumn component.</p>

A page column component.

| Name                                    | Type                                   | Default                             | Description                   |
| :-------------------------------------- | :------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------- | :---------------------------- |
